title: True of the long-run Phillips curve

content.question: Which of the following is true for a long-run Phillips curve?

choices.label: It represents points for which expected and actual inflation rates are equal.
It shifts to the left when aggregate supply decreases.
It shifts to the left when money supply decreases.
It shifts to the right when transfer payments decrease.
It is horizontal because there is no change in inflation.

content.answer: It represents points for which expected and actual inflation rates are equal.
